name: Splatgun
description:
Note: I'm uploading newer post-jam versions with slight improvements, but retaining the original jam version just in case.

Controls:
Arrow keys to move
X to shoot
C to go into squid/octo form
Z to booyah (the most important feature)
ESC will close the game at any time
F4 while on the title screen will toggle the game to fullscreen/windowed

Setup:

The attached zip contains two files: the client exe and the server exe.
One player (the host) will need to run the server exe. They'll need to forward port 10008 (and also clear it through their firewall) for any remote players to be able to connect.
Once the server is up and running, players will be able to connect to the server with the host's IP (the host can go to https://whatismyipaddress.com/ and copy the ipv4 to get their own IP address). After that, once all connected players are ready,  the game will begin! Note that the maximum player count is currently set to 4...

This is my first networked game, so sorry that the interface is super wonky and not intuitive at all.
